entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
